thread.section_title: Millenium Hilton - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing stay
thread.title_full: Amazing stay - Review of Millenium Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kittiboros0121
title: Amazing stay
text:
We have stayed 3 nights at the hotel and we loved every minute. The view was just amazing, the location is the best. The breakfast is really nice and you have a good selection and friendly staff welcoming you at the restaurant.
Cyntia at check in and check out was absolut professional, and couldn't be more helpful.
We really enjoyed our stay and we will definitely go back.
